Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Understood. I will change the cruising direction right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'As for her condition...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discord looks back at the girl sleeping in the isolation pod to check her condition before answering Nikola.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'So far so good. Her weapon has already been disarmed. I will work with Asimov to install her blocker.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Understood. I will do my best.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Nikola hangs up, Discord looks at the fully armed members around her and lets out a barely noticeable sigh.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: '(Even Gray Raven can be abandoned when there is a need...)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'What do we do next, Captain?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'We have a new destination, so we need to adjust our route. Turn on the Omega purification system, power up the operation cabin and connect to the remote operating table.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The shuttle slightly trembles as it starts heading to the new coordinates. Lucia is pushed into the operation cabin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll start installing the blocker now. Keep the shuttle steady.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'We have entered the destination airspace. No suspicious target found so far.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Has the accuracy of the coordinates been updated?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "We are updating them right now. The Science Council's locating system needs some time to calculate.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'An alarm suddenly goes off inside the cabin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "We've been locked on by anti-air missiles! How did they find us? This shuttle has the most advanced stealth coating!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Is it from the surface?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "No! It comes from the air! It's an unidentified fighter aircraft!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The entire cabin is lighted up by the red, flashing alarm. Ear-splitting noises fill up the space.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Let's get landed first. This shuttle is not armed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "There's no time! We must survive this wave first! Just grab something!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The pilot slams the button. Lots of metal foils are launched from the shuttle's tail, glowing in the sky like fireworks."}
{3: 'He then pulls up the control stick, trying to lift the shuttle up.'}
{3: 'A loud explosion has shaken the cabin.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Brace yourself! Another wave is coming!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'More foils were launched, but this time everybody heard something cracking after the explosion.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Left wing damaged! The fuel is leaking. We are going down!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pilot tries his best to control the shuttle, preventing it from tumbling.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Everybody, evacuate the shuttle. Get into the escape pod.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'What about her? The escape pods can only fit one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Put her in a pod for now. We'll look for her after landing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Shall we wake her up then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "...Turn on delayed awakening. The Science Council said as long as the blocker was working properly, waking her up wouldn't have much impact on the symptoms.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Roger!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discord hesitates for a moment and adds.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Put her weapons inside too.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "Hurry up! I don't have much chaff left!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Everyone, get into the cabin now! Prepare to eject!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She wanders in the empty darkness. With nothing to refer to, she cannot even tell the directions.'}
{3: 'Is this a dream? Or the chaos in her M.I.N.D.?'}
{3: 'Unable to find an answer, she can only take futile steps toward where "front" might be.'}
{3: 'As she walks, the bubbles of memories begin to ripple.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz113.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Crying in the rain holding her sister. Deceived by the fake ghost on the frostland.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1503.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory512.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Fought hard on the Observatory of Kowloong. Saved the white bird from falling on the roof of the church.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1901_3.jpg'}
{3: 'Betrayed by many.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1201_2.jpg'}
{3: 'Loved by many.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{3: 'Disgusted by how despicable and greedy people could be.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'Touched by the beauty of humanity in the apocalypse.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Like the matches held by a little girl, the warm memories only lingered for a short moment in the chilling darkness.'}
{3: 'When she reaches the end of the intersecting memories, she finally stops.'}
{3: 'Where to go now?'}
{3: 'What to do now?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory597.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "The world is already beyond redemption. Why don't you just live an easy life instead of finding ways to change it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then why do you look so sad when you occasionally gaze at the ocean?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'We all long for a home. Even the sturdiest ship will need a harbor. Even the strongest heart will need to feel warmth.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Home... But I...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Have no place to go back to.', 3: '100', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg'}
{3: 'Blood-stained memories suddenly come back to her. She has done something irreversible.'}
{3: 'It has nothing to do with whether that person will forgive her or not. She has violated the unquestionable laws.'}
{3: 'That person told her to not lose. But she already lost everything the moment her blade touched blood.'}
{3: 'Perhaps there is only one thing she can do...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Leave forever.', 3: '100', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Isn't it too pessimistic to think you are alone? As long as you still have a place with people waiting for you, that place is your home.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You have been fighting for too long. It's time to rest. You can have a rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'But there are many things she has yet to complete.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'You can leave everything behind and come over. I have always been waiting for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just leave the rest to us.', 3: '157'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I couldn't do anything to help Luna, but the Ascension-Network will never be my home.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I never leave everything to others.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'My home is Gray Raven. I will never break it apart, or betray what I believe in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Even faced with endless battles, I will not fear them. I will fight on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because we both have promised.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Because we both have the same goal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'To restore the world to its original shape.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'To bring new changes to this world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia & Alpha', 3: 'I will witness the future myself!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '>>>>>>>>>>System rebooting<<<<<<<<<<', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '>>>>>>>>>>Reboot complete. Consciousness: Lucia, online<<<<<<<<<<', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Lucia opens her eyes again. Apart from a few indicators, the cabin is completely dark.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'She fumbles around and finally finds the button. The cabin door drops to the ground, letting chilling wind and snow in.'}
{3: 'Lucia looks back at the escape pod and finds her equipment and comms device inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'My equipment is still here, but someone seems to have added something to the Inver-Device. The comms device... has no signal?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'For them to use an escape pod like this... Was there an accident?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia examines the slightly deformed escape pod. She realizes the transmitter used to send distress signals was not activated.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Does that mean the enemy is not Corrupted or Hetero-Creature?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The escape pod's transmitter was manually disabled before launch. Whoever did this was probably trying to avoid being detected, unless there was a malfunction during the landing."}
{3: 'After a few more failed attempts, Lucia turns on her terminal and finds an unread message.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'This message is for Lucia, our mission target. I am Discord, a member of the Purifying Force. If you are reading this message, you have already been separated from the escort team.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Based on the backup plan provided by the HQ, I hereby give you the following mission:', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'What is happening to your frame is related to a source that you keep receiving signals from.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'If you find yourself lost and are unable to regroup with us, please locate the signal source. To self-rescue, you must attempt to destroy itâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The source of that signal... It must be Alpha.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia is quite certain after recapping the memories that didn't belong to her during the hibernation."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alpha... So this is what you have been fighting against.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia gazes through the storm and looks at the mountain peak.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If you really think that way...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia takes out her terminal and turns on the recorder.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is Lucia from Gray Raven. The following recording is not subject to any form of coercion or interference. It is entirely of my own volition.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia's voice faintly echoes in the snowstorm, like a solo piece before the finale."}
{3: 'After recording the message, Lucia puts the terminal back in the escape pod. She grabs the name tags and decides not to put them in.'}
{3: 'She takes her equipment and walks toward the peak in deep snow.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I must put an end to this.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'When Alpha opens her eyes again, there is no more Corrupted nearby. The sludge on her body has also disappeared.'}
{3: 'Thinking of the chaotic experience in her M.I.N.D., She looks a little exhausted.'}
{3: 'She looks at her new frame. The white windbreaker flies in the wind, blending into the snow in the background.'}
{3: 'A black bandage wraps around her crimson left hand, but it cannot contain the red electricity current leaking through the gaps.'}
{3: 'The more she uses the power of Ascension-Network, the more she will transform toward the direction of its filtering.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'This is my contradiction...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her mighty power is constrained within an unbreakable shackle. A blade that cannot be sheathed will hurt not only others, but also herself.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Gray Raven... Huh.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She whispers the name that holds complex meanings to her.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Even Gray Raven can be abandoned when necessary.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha puts on her poker face again as she recalls the fragments of memory.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'They are still trying to exploit the situation for their own good. How foolish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'No matter what Gray Raven has accomplished, they are still a pawn.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks at the figure that slowly walks out of the storm.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Alright. Let me see what you will choose.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: "After crossing to the other side of the mountain, Lucia's vision suddenly clears up."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{3: 'Only the sound of the snowstorm can be heard in the vast mountain peak. An expected figure has shown up.'}
{3: 'Alpha has changed a lot from what Lucia remembers. Still, she recognizes her immediately.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I knew you would come.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you the reason behind my symptoms?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You already know the answer. Are you still hoping this is a coincidence?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I just want to find out the truth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '...The Ascension-Network is running a new round of filtering. You were incorrectly chosen as a target because our M.I.N.D. had the same root.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A new round of filtering?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "That's none of your business, unless you also want to become an Ascendant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...So this won't stop even if I destroy you, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Correct. Once the filtering has started, the Ascension-Network will not stop until there is a result.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Even if you manage to kill me, you will just have to deal with twice the stress.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Besides, you will never have the chance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'If you ask me, I suggest you go back and spend your final days with Gray Raven.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You can stop this filtering, can't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '...So you saw my memories through the resonance of M.I.N.D.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Right, there is a possible solution.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Alpha did not deny it. She paused for a while and answered.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's work together then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Do you even realize what you just said?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I saw your memories, so I know you want to stop the filtering to go against the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Wait a second. We are enemies. Have you finally decided to give up Babylonia for this path?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia grabs the equipment she took from the escape pod.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Pushing you completely to the Ascension-Network will do us no good. I don't want to help it either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's our common enemy now. That gives us a foundation for cooperation.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What if I say no?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia slowly draws her blade out. It gives a chilling reflection in the wind.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'll just do my best to change your mind then. No matter what it takes, I will put an end to this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will go back to Gray Raven and those who are supporting me as Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'It seems Gray Raven has become your weakness. It has taken away from you the courage to sacrifice.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sacrifice may be an option, but it will traumatize those who are still living no matter what.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I have already hurt that person...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia clenches her fist and puts it on her chest, right over the artificial heart.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But after going through so many things, I have also learned the feeling of heartache. I will never let it happen to others again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That\'s why I promised them that I would "safely return."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Regardless of what I will be facing later. Be it a court-martial, surveillance, or even if I have to become a research subject.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will end this once and for all, then go back to apologize to Commandant, and everyone who worried about me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_01.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_02.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_03.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_04.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_05.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_06.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3402_01.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_10.jpg'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You just never learn!'}
{3: 'Alpha also unsheathes her blade, striking the same stance as Lucia.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I once had expectations for you, hoping that you would unveil a different future for me.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Who would have thought that you only became more loyal to humans and ended up a convenient weapon?'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Why would you do that? How does it benefit you?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The lack of trust between us means we can only cooperate temporarily.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I can't put all my hope on you. Now that I am no longer clueless like I used to be, I must take action."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You are digging your own grave.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Still better than doing nothing, especially when the threat is right in front of me.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'If you really think that way...'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Show me what you are made of then.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm also curious to know..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Whether you really can contain this power.'}
